name: Ruake
description:
Ruake is a survival arena fps where your goal is to get the highest score before you die. This was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam in less than 48hrs.

Gameplay

wasd keys - to move

spacebar - to jump

left mouse - to shoot

r key - to reload

left shift - to sprint

Enemies have dice over their heads, when they are shot your score is multiplied by the number over their heads, and every enemy killed rerolls all other dice.
Killing enemies with curtain numbered dice over their heads gives you that number, collect all die faces to make them drop a new gun.
Every time you reload you will get a random score multiplier so make sure to pay attention to your reload animation.
Not every gun has a reload animation and will break when they run out of a clip, these special guns will give you a score multiplier when you pick it up.
